charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F - charging him or her with bank robbery

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:2113A.F - charging him or her with bank robbery

charges.charge_description: BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the BOP for a term of 42 MONTHS. It is recommended that defendant be allowed to participate in residential, comprehensive substance abuse treatment while incarcerated. SRT THREE (3) YEARS. Defendant is to participate in a program of testing and treatment for drug and/or alcohol treatment as directed by the Probation Office. SA $100.00
